trans-unit.source: Supplies base class implementation for all activity designer theme classes used in a workflow design-time environment.

All classes that supply theme property settings to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes must inherit from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> class.

Designer themes provide a set of property values with which to display background and foreground colors and styles, fonts, and other style settings for the designer classes displayed on a workflow design surface.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> class also inherits from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>.

When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref> class by using a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> with which the designer theme is associated.
Gets or sets the unqualified name of the designer type to which the designer theme is applied.

The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ApplyTo%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer by using the unqualified name of the designer type, while the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.DesignerType%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer type by using the <xref:System.Type> of the designer.
The name of the designer type to which the designer theme is applied.
A user attempted a set operation when the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly"></xref> property was set to `true`.
Gets the workflow theme that encapsulates the designer theme.

The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ContainingTheme%2A> property returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> object that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A> used during initialization.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref>.
Gets or sets the type of the designer associated with the designer theme.

The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.DesignerType%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer type by using the <xref:System.Type> of the designer, while the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ApplyTo%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer by using the unqualified name of the designer type.

Possible values for this property include <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, and any classes created by activity designer developers that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that represents the designer to be associated with the current designer theme.
A user attempted a set operation when the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly"></xref> property was set to `true`.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
`true` to release both managed and unmanaged resources; `false` to release only unmanaged resources.
Allows the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref> to attempt to free resources and perform other clean-up operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.Finalize%2A> releases only unmanaged resources prior to garbage collection.
Performs further initialization tasks beyond those performed by <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.#ctor(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme)"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> class provides no default behavior for this method.
Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> must provide their own logic for this method.
Notifies the designer theme class that the ambient property settings for the designer have changed.

Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> use this method to make necessary changes when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeration value changes from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize> to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.OperatingSystemSetting> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.OperatingSystemSetting> to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize>.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeration determines where a designer theme obtains its ambient property settings.

If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> property.

If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.OperatingSystemSetting> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the operating system on which the designer is installed.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty"></xref> enumeration value that the designer theme should now use.
Gets a value that indicates whether the designer theme is read-only.

If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> is initialized with is not a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly%2A> obtains its value from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> is a null reference (`Nothing`), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly%2A> is `false`.

If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> is assigned to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true`, and properties on all designer themes associated with this theme cannot be changed.
If required, properties can be set after loading the theme but before assigning it to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A>.
`true` if <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `false`.
Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.
This version of `Dispose` implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
